description:
Get that perfect crust every time. The Infrared Laser Thermometer lets you measure the surface temperature of your pizza stone so you know exactly when to pop the pizza in. Aim for around 400°C. It also works on other BBQs, open fires or even your home oven and stovetop.

  • Range is from -50°C to 550°C (-58°F to 1022°F)
  • Large screen is easy to read
  • Dimensions are 19 x 13 x 6cm
  • Includes thermometer, 2 x AAA batteries and instruction manual
name: Ooni Infrared Thermometer
